thread.title: BRIEF-Grayscale Investments Announces Launch Of Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund

title: BRIEF-Grayscale Investments Announces Launch Of Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund
text:
February 7, 2018 / 5:25 PM / in 19 minutes BRIEF-Grayscale Investments Announces Launch Of Grayscale Digital Large Cap Fund Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Grayscale Investments LLC: 
* GRAYSCALE INVESTMENTS ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF THE GRAYSCALE DIGITAL LARGE CAP FUND 
* GRAYSCALE INVESTMENTS LLC SAYS ANNOUNCED LAUNCH OF NEW INVESTMENT VEHICLE, GRAYSCALE DIGITAL LARGE CAP FUND LLC​ 
* GRAYSCALE INVESTMENTS - FUND INTENDS TO HOLD TOP DIGITAL ASSETS BY MARKET CAP THAT MEET GRAYSCALE‘S CRITERIA IN MARKET CAP-WEIGHTED PORTFOLIO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 806 749 1136)
